meanings.definition: In a kind or gentle manner.
meanings.sent1: She smiled kindlier at the scared puppy.
meanings.sent2: He spoke kindlier to his younger sister after the argument.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy cat meowed kindlier than usual when given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone kindlier through the clouds, brightening the day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice sounded kindlier as she praised the students' efforts.

meanings.definition: More kind or gentle than something else.
meanings.sent1: The kindlier approach to discipline yielded better results.
meanings.sent2: She had a kindlier demeanor compared to her strict boss.
meanings.sent3: The kindlier option of sharing the last cookie made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The kindlier version of the story had a happier ending.
meanings.sent5: The kindlier tone of the letter softened the criticism.
